ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: We are your lift, it ll be easy to carry her with both of us strong handsome bots doing it, I don t know about you, though, if you want to help you can.

"We are your lift, it'll be easy to carry her with both of us strong
handsome bots doing it, I don't know about you, though, if you want to help
you can." Sinesis said. Obviously their egos were inflating like a
balloon...
----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 20, 2000 9:27 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> ::DarkMouse::
>
> She walked up to Dracona and shot her agian with another tranquilizer
> dart. "Now she will be no trouble.  You two! (points to Sinesis and
> Sinister) Go and get a lift, she will need to be moved to the lab and
> strapped down to a table.  She won't wake up for hours.  But when she
> does, she will be a handfull.  Let's get moved."  She loked at the
> pair again. "Go and get me that lift. Now!"
> She really didn't like giving orders, but Quickstrike had left her in
> charge.  She was trying to please Megatron by offering him a prize,
> this new bot.  But something in her felt wrong.  She looked at
> Dracona and saw part of herself laying there.  She didn't know why,
> but seeing the bot lay there brought lost images from her past back
> to her.
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Life's too short to send boring email. Let SuperSig come to the rescue.
